title: U-Konserve | DIY Instructions To Make Reusable Fabric Straw Sleeves
body: Here's why you should think twice before using plastic: Americans use 500 million plastic straws every day. Placed end to end, the number of disposable straws used in the U.S. in the past four days could reach the moon. We use enough to fill over 125 school buses with plastic straws every day. That's 46,000 school buses every year full of ...
